Description: Papyrus written with black ink with demotic administrative text. Writing on recto only, 8 lines. Thompson's MS Catalogue (numbered as 10118 C): "accounts relating to wheat and barley [...] Date. Persian. prob. Darius. Origin. uncertain".
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (381215) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/381215)
